headline.main: Letters to the Editor; On Selling Jets to the Mideast and Chile Bugging at State I Love a Parade East Side Terminal:Keep the Garages Of Marijuana, Health and the Law

docs.abstract: L Adams lr maintains E Side Airline Terminal, which will close in fall '73, should be converted into parking facility

byline.original: MARTIN BENDERWILSON C. LUCOMKATHY ANNE O'CONNORLEO ADAMSHENRY G. FISCHERROBERT W. JASPENT. R. ROBIE, M.D

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It is with some distress that one reads of the possible sale by our Gov ernment of two dozen or more Phan tom jets to Saudi Arabia and of othert ypes of modern aircraft to Kuwait.
docs.snippet: To the Editor: It is with some distress that one reads of the possible sale by our Gov ernment of two dozen or more Phan tom jets to Saudi Arabia and of othert ypes of modern aircraft to Kuwait.

docs.abstract: Dr R H Hart comments on health hazards to nonsmokers exposed to tobacco smokers' exhalations in poorly ventilated rooms; cites studies published in '69 concerning problem

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: No smoke signal ever delivered a clearer message. There it is on every package. "Warning: The Surgeon Gen eral Has Determined That Cigarette Smoking Is Dangerous to Your Health." Yet millions of smokers fog the packet's warning in a smokescreen ofdenial and indifference.
